1153660.name: Azure Demo
1153660.description:
The full game is currently available for free through the demo!

As the game is currently in early access, I wanted the opportunity to get your valuable feedback without you risking another pre-release purchase. If you have suggestions or criticisms I would love to hear about them here in the community hub!



Ship builder - Use different shapes to construct any ship design you want!
Trade – Barter with different merchants for a variety of goods.
Resource gathering – Grow or harvest different resources to meet the needs of your ship and crew.
Citizen management – Manage the well-being of your citizens to keep them happy and healthy.
Combat – Build an army of heroes to attack different factions. Equip them with weapons, armour and skills.
